name: Utku's Space Game
description:
Utku's Space Game

The goal of the game is to save the aliens.

There are a total of 10 aliens on the map.

Saving 5 aliens wins the game.

Aliens have 6 lives. (They receive damage on hit.)

Astroids deal 1 damage on impact.

Your total life in the game is 5.

Your spaceship carries 2 types of weapons:
Laser Gun:
Damage: 1 (Left Mouse)

Blaze Gun (Right Mouse)
Damage: 3

Movement:
To turn your spaceship to the right (D)
To turn your spaceship to the left (A)
To move your spaceship forward (Space)
